name: Bushman pin
description:
Sterling silver pin (3.8g) in shape of bushman 4 sqcm.

The Bushman pin can be worn as a lapel pin, tie pin, on coat or a hat or where ever you choose to display it. The pin is dramatic, attention-grabbing and a great conversation starter. Crafted in South Africa.

name: Sterling silver money clip
description:
Solid and robust sterling silver money clip (20.4g) w/ bushman motif 5.25cmx2cm.  Be the sophisticated gentleman regardless of the type of currency or quantity you carry.  Crafted in South Africa.

Quantities are limited.

name: Rectangular Sterling silver cufflink (polished finish)
description:
Sterling silver ~6.6g brass bullet backs and bushman motif 1.25cmx2.5cm engraved.

Bushmen are the oldest existing population as analysis of the blood of San people shows the oldest genetic markers on earth. They are depicted in the famous intricate rock and cave paintings in the Cape of southern parts of Africa. The bushmen as depicted in the silver accessories hunted using poison arrows and spears for extented laborious, and exurting periods of time. Know for their stamina, great tracking abilities and all around efficiency.

Celebrate the bushman spirit of stamina and endurance in you with these sophisticated cufflinks and other accessories. Make an impression with everyday business attire, at your wedding or any special occasion while wearing French Cuffs. Made in South Africa.

name: Zulu shield sterling silver cufflink with brass bullet backs
description:
Shields were seen to have medicinal, magic powers. Before battle, shields were sprinkled with herbs (muti). This was done to increase the protective power of the shield, to ensure that that the warrior came to no harm. 

A modern take on the Zulu tradition, solid and sturdy at 12.1 gram, the sterling silver (92%) shield cufflinks with brass bullets are 3cm long  and 1.8cm wide. Matching tie bars are also available. The Zulu Shield  is attention-grabbing and a great conversation starter. Made in South Africa.

Great for groom and bestmen gifts!!

name: Bushman motif sterling silver tie bar
description:
Sterling Silver tie bar is 6.5cm long and weighs ~9.3g. 

Secure a tie on a windy day or add a touch of shinny sophistication to your formal wear. Great for daily use or on special occasions. The bushmen as depicted in action in this silver accessory. They are know for their stamina, great tracking abilities and all around efficiency. Celebrate the bushman spirit of stamina and endurance in your daily triumphs with these sophisticated cufflinks and other accessories. Crafted in South Africa
